page.title: 04Buying a House
page.content: The average house price in Immingahm does not mean much because there are so many different types of houses in the town. The most expensive are Â£30,000 to Â£40,000 and the cheapest are as low as Â£6,000. The area from which most people move into Immingham is Grimsby .The most popular type of house is the semi-detached. The houses that take longer to sell are the higher priced ones.The most popular time for buying and selling is in the spring between Easter and summer. The number of houses for sale at any one time in Immingham is roughly 15 to 20 from each Estate Agent of which there are 3 in the town. There are a lot of enquiries from outside Immingham even from York,Liverpool and as far as Dorset. (continued)
